info.name: BeepNodeAPI
info.description: BeepNode uses TalkJS RestAPI. The API here handles fetching, posting and filtering Conversations on Beep Communication Platform.

item.name: Login
item.description: API for Login and Token Verification. To test other API's these must be run first.

response.body:
{
    "status": true,
    "data": {
        "total_count": 20,
        "data": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "faq_module_id": 1,
                "faq_category_id": 1,
                "faq_sub_category_id": 1,
                "target_app_id": 0,
                "question": "What is the difference between endorsement, review and rating?",
                "answer": "Endorsement can be kept in the account by all Users, Service Providers, or Property Agents (it serves as an intangible asset that provides credibility value), while review and rating are only available for Service Providers or Property Agents after you have consumed their services.",

                "answer": "There is no limit to the number of endorsements that can be kept in the account.",

                "answer": "For iPhone users, you can download ProppyApp from [Apple Store](https://apps.apple.com/my/app/proppyapp/id1519445303). For Huawei users, download it from [Huawei App Gallery](https://appgallery.huawei.com/#/app/C104530257).",
                "seq_no": 2,
                "status": 1,
                "like_count": null,

            },

                "target_app_id": 0,
                "question": "How do I receive endorsement?",
                "answer": "Endorsement can be received when Users, Service Providers, or Property Agents visit your account page via the endorsement link provided and leave a comment or endorse.",

                "status": 1,
                "like_count": null,

                "seq_no": 1,

                "seq_no": 2,
                "status": 1,
                "like_count": null,
                "dislike_count": null
            },
            {
                "id": 5,
                "faq_module_id": 1,
                "faq_category_id": 2,
                "faq_sub_category_id": 5,
                "target_app_id": 0,
                "question": "How do I receive endorsement?",
                "answer": "Endorsement can be received when Users, Service Providers, or Property Agents visit your account page via the endorsement link provided and leave a comment or endorse.",
                "seq_no": 1,
                "status": 1,
                "like_count": null,
                "dislike_count": null
            },
            {
                "id": 6,
                "faq_module_id": 1,
                "faq_category_id": 2,
                "faq_sub_category_id": 6,
                "target_app_id": 0,
                "question": "Is it good to have more endorsements?",
                "answer": "Yes. The more endorsements received, the higher the credibility for the User, Service Provider, or Property Agent, subject to the Credibility Weightage System.",
                "seq_no": 1,
                "status": 1,
                "like_count": null,
                "dislike_count": null
            },

                "id": 7,

                "faq_sub_category_id": 7,
                "target_app_id": 0,
                "question": "What is endorsement?",
                "answer": "Endorsement is a form of recognition in ProppyApp, allowing Users to comment on other Users, Service Providers, or Property Agents. It builds credibility based on the weightage calculation system.",
                "seq_no": 1,
                "status": 1,
                "like_count": null,
                "dislike_count": null
            },

                "faq_category_id": 2,
                "faq_sub_category_id": 8,

                "question": "How can I refer/share to my friends?",
                "answer": "You can share via referral link or QR code. **Via Referral link:** 1. Login to ProppyApp 2. Go to Account page 3. Tap the QR code icon below ProppyID and email address 4. Tap \"Share QR\" and select a sharing method (e.g., WhatsApp). Make sure your referral link matches your ProppyID. **Via QR Code:**",
                "seq_no": 1,
                "status": 1,
                "like_count": null,
                "dislike_count": null
            },
            {
                "id": 18,
                "faq_module_id": 1,
                "faq_category_id": 2,
                "faq_sub_category_id": 8,
                "target_app_id": 0,

                "answer": "Yes. The more endorsements received, the higher the credibility for the User, Service Provider, or Property Agent, subject to the Credibility Weightage System.",
                "seq_no": 2,
                "status": 1,
                "like_count": null,
                "dislike_count": null
            },
            {
                "id": 9,
                "faq_module_id": 1,
                "faq_category_id": 2,
                "faq_sub_category_id": 9,
                "target_app_id": 0,
                "question": "I entered the wrong Referral ID while registering, can I change it?",
                "answer": "You may change it ONCE if you used PROPPY as the referral ID.",
                "seq_no": 1,
                "status": 1,
                "like_count": null,
                "dislike_count": null
            },
            {
                "id": 10,
                "faq_module_id": 1,
                "faq_category_id": 2,
                "faq_sub_category_id": 10,
                "target_app_id": 0,
                "question": "Can I transfer ProppyGems to others?",
                "answer": "Yes. By selecting the \"Transfer\" button on the Chest screen, you can transfer gems to others. Enter the recipient's ProppyID, the number of gems to send, and optionally, a note to your recipient.",
                "seq_no": 1,
                "status": 1,
                "like_count": null,
                "dislike_count": null
            },
            {
                "id": 19,
                "faq_module_id": 1,

                "seq_no": 2,
                "status": 1,
                "like_count": null,
                "dislike_count": null
            },
            {
                "id": 11,

                "faq_category_id": 2,
                "faq_sub_category_id": 11,
                "target_app_id": 0,
                "question": "How can I claim my reward?",
                "answer": "1. Login to your account 2. Go to Account page and tap on \"claim reward\" 3. Fill in the necessary details and claim your reward.",
                "seq_no": 1,
                "status": 1,
                "like_count": null,
                "dislike_count": null
            },
            {
                "id": 12,
                "faq_module_id": 1,
                "faq_category_id": 2,
                "faq_sub_category_id": 12,
                "target_app_id": 0,
                "question": "Why am I not receiving the OTP?",
                "answer": "Possible reasons: **Incorrect Number:** The mobile number you provided may be incorrect. **Connectivity Issues:** Your service provider may be facing issues. **Network Strength:** Weak network signal. Tap \"Resend Code\" to receive a new OTP.",
                "seq_no": 1,
                "status": 1,
                "like_count": null,
                "dislike_count": null
